attributes.action: Stop NHS Cuts in Blackpool, Wyre and Fylde
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Huge cuts are been made in the local area. Jobs are being lost, people having to re-apply for jobs. But most of all newly-qualified nurses are coming out of training with no posts becauses wards have been closed. If anything there should be more nurses and other vital staff recruited not axed and new wards opened.
